channel.description: The Okta org Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Doc needs a thorough review and possibly updated to include new org features. item.title: Org object model

item.title: Policies

They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.
